subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Taylor was an American sprinter who won gold and silver medals in the 1972 Olympics in Munich after two of his teammates were memorably disqualified because of a scheduling mix-up.
snippet: Mr. Taylor was an American sprinter who won gold and silver medals in the 1972 Olympics in Munich after two of his teammates were memorably disqualified because of a scheduling mix-up.
